data.title: Internship Project Management (All Genders)
data.description:
JOIN US

We're on the hunt for an electrifying intern ready to join forces with our Event & Experiential team and dive headfirst into a world of thrilling projects. Get ready to fuel your motivation and be part of the excitement!

  • Take charge and help overseeing the project budget.
  • Unleash the cool factor with killer presentations, wowing clients with progress, deliverables, and recommendations.
  • Keep it cool by ensuring the work hits the agency's quality standards and dances to the client's beat.
  • Ride the wave of market research, catching trends, shredding competitor analyses, and bringing in the best info for projects.

  • Support by being the deadline maestro, ensuring milestones and project goals drop on time, every time.

  • You're not just a student; Whether you're deep into your studies or already aced them, you crave a backstage pass into the thrilling life of a project manager.

WHAT TO EXPECT

  • Working in an international and supradisciplinary team with top talents from different fields.

  • Meaning plenty of opportunities to create big ideas, for big projects, with big impact.
  • Thriving in a new environment with opportunities to develop your career in a flat structure.

  • A working environment that ensures fair and equal opportunities for all. We live and support diversity, openness and mutual respect and welcome new colleagues - regardless of nationality, ethnicity, origin, religion, age, gender, gender identity and sexual orientation. You should too. It‚Äôs the 21st century.

data.title: Working Student CRM Performance (all genders)
data.description:
Babbel is the top-selling language learning platform globally. We are driven by our purpose of creating mutual understanding through language. Through the , classes, , and products, we provide learners with the most effective solutions, enabling them to communicate in real-life scenarios with real people.

The Babbel team is as diverse as our content. With headquarters in Berlin, Germany and our US office in New York, we're a team of 1,000+ people from over 80 different nationalities.

For more information about Babbel and our language learning solutions, please visit www.babbel.com or download our app from the App Store or Play Store.

We are looking for a Working Student CRM Performance (all genders) to work within the CRM Team.

You will join our team in Berlin on a part time basis and will work on helping the CRM team achieve Babbel's objectives of improving customer value via multichannel campaigns. You will also collaborate with other Marketing and Product teams to make this possible. CRM (Customer Relationship Management) is a marketing team sending emails, push notifications or in-app messages to users with a target of improving the revenues and lifetime value of the customers. This position is limited for one year.

You will:

  • Support, plan, design, implement and track the CRM A/B tests and campaigns.
  • Work with our creative and copy teams to deliver the most impactful campaign communication.
  • Analyse data and create / update reports, using our internal CRM and data tools to track performance and identify opportunities.
  • Collaborate with other teams in Marketing, Product and Business Analytics.
  • Join an international team of 10 people in a +1000 employees company

You are:

  • Enrolled as a student, ideally pursuing a degree with a focus in marketing, business studies, business informatics or similar.
  • A team player, motivated to create a positive environment at Babbel and with a learning mindset to familiarize with unknown topics.
  • Able to structure yourself and with an eye for detail.
  • Available at least 16 hrs/week for a minimum of six months working student position.
  • Based in Berlin as the role includes recurring in-the-office responsibilities.

You have:

  • An interest in marketing and data insights.
  • Ambition to deliver concrete results across multiple KPIs.
  • Excellent communication and writing skills in English.
  • A data-driven approach.
  • A good eye for visual and textual creatives.
  • Experience with GSuite (e.g. Sheets, Slides, Docs).

Nice to have:

  • Previous experience in CRM and/or digital marketing.

Some perks of becoming a Babbelonian:

  • Enjoy 30 vacation days. Plus family and life situation counseling.
  • Decide how, when and from where you want to work with our flexible working hours and remote friendly options or work from our fully equipped office with nap, faith and family rooms.
  • Learn and grow with the internal learning opportunities. Learn languages with Babbel for free with your full access to Babbel & Babbel Live classes.
  • Be part of our employee communities (such as Femgineers, DE&I Ambassadors and LGBTQIA groups), attend cultural and regular social events.

Diversity at Babbel

As part of our ongoing journey towards building a diverse, equitable and inclusive company, we welcome everyone to apply, especially those individuals who are underrepresented in tech. We are a learning company, inside and out, and we encourage you to apply even if you do not fit all the technical requirements - all candidates are assessed based on skills, qualifications and on our business needs. Please state your pronouns in your application, and let us know if you‚Äôd like to be addressed by a name other than the one appearing on your official documents. If you have a disability or special need, feel welcome to inform us, so that we can provide you with the proper assistance in the application process.

Sounds good? We are already looking forward to hearing from you! Check out also , and to get an impression about !

data.title: Product Manager
data.description:
ABOUT THE ROLE:

In the role of Product Manager, your primary responsibility will be to extract valuable insights and requirements from our clients and stakeholders, leverage your strong analytical capabilities and technical background, and transform these insights into detailed specifications for the creation of new features and enhancements. You will have complete ownership of one of our product domains.

ABOUT THE TEAM

Our Product team consists of experts specializing in Frontend, Backend, Quality Assurance, and Design. Additionally, we have dedicated Engineering Managers and, naturally, other Product Managers on board. We operate within collaborative, cross-functional squads, each tasked with specific responsibilities for introducing fresh features and enhancements to our platform. As we are set to expand our product offerings and increase our number of teams in the coming months, your expertise will play a pivotal role in our continued success.

ONCE YOU ARE HERE YOU WILL:

  • Develop a deep understanding of the market and our customer base
  • Identify the customers‚Äô needs from the user interviews, usability tests, sales and integration calls, and actively seek out new product possibilities
  • Work closely with our technical team in an end-to-end Scrum squad
  • Establish strong relationships with Technical Account Managers (TAMs), Integration Managers of our integration partners, Customer Success Managers (CSM) and Sales teams to facilitate product development.

WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING TO THE TABLE:

  • At least 3 years of experience in a Product Manager role within the B2B SaaS industry
  • Coming from a QA or database development background would be a great addition to your skillset
  • Experience with loyalty programs, incentives and pricing is more than welcomed
  • Profound understanding of API architecture
  • Advance knowledge of SQL and databases
  • Proven track record of working with cross-functional teams in an agile environment
  • Excellent verbal and written English communication skills

WHAT WE OFFER:

  • Established team of 9 Product Managers, all Berlin-based team who occasionally visit in the office
  • Cross-collaborative and knowledge-sharing environment
  • Great brands portfolio to collaborate with and learn from
  • pet-friendly office + day off for your birthday
  • mental health support through nilo-health

WHY YOU SHOULD WORK FOR US:

  • The right attitude: modern methods and a diverse, creative workspace with an open and international culture
  • Everyone for the product: Together we create a flexible, highly scalable product with state-of-the-art technologies. We can only succeed if everyone works as a team
  • Healthy Growth: Growing our company means growing everyone in the team. We love to share knowledge and learn
  • A great environment: Flexible and family-friendly environment, bright and easily accessible offices, modern software and hardware
  • High flexibility degree: Prefer to work early or late at night? Do you have to pick up your children from kindergarten? Do you prefer working abroad? We believe in results and motivated employees

Do you want this job?

We‚Äôd love to hear from you! Apply directly via the form below.

Talon.One is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer that proudly pursues and hires a diverse workforce. We do not make employment decisions on the basis of race, color, religious belief, ethnic origin, nationality, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, military or veteran status, or any other basis protected by applicable local, state, or federal laws or prohibited by company policy. As an employer we strive for a healthy and safe workplace and strictly prohibit harassment of any kind.

data.title: Senior Java Developer (m/f/d)
data.description:
Core Values at wealthpilot

Be the pilot people trust
At wealthpilot, all employees see themselves as pilots of trust. We act according to the rules of empathy, appreciation and collegiality.

Make the plane fly
On our way to our destination, we experience resistance and turbulence, but thanks to our determination, solution and performance orientation, we always arrive at our destination on time and earn the applause of the passengers.

The sky is not the limit
We lead the market, we bring innovation and dynamics, we stick to our vision and thanks to our agility we exceed our targets.

What makes you special

Your excellent communication and presentation skills set you apart, as they enable you to effectively bridge the gap between business stakeholders and developers. This unique ability ensures that project goals are clearly understood and met, aligning technical solutions with business needs.

These are your tasks

  • You drive the wealthpilot‚Äôs platform design and provide secure, scalable, reliable and efficient solutions.
  • You commit to transparency and open communications.
  • You embody ownership of the solutions from conception to deployment, ensuring scalability and robustness.
  • You take on the challenging initiatives, fostering a culture of openness and collective growth by mentoring colleagues through proactive engagement and knowledge sharing.
  • You exemplify adaptability and a progressive mindset, contributing uniquely and positively to the organization's vision.

What you have to offer

  • You are a visionary and proactive developer with a Senior Developer's technical mastery, and you enjoy crafting elegant solutions that challenge the status quo.
  • You have profound knowledge in Java and the Spring ecosystem.
  • You show practical experience in the application of advanced design concepts such as DDD, Onion Architecture or Event Sourcing and you know when one should be applied.
  • You are proficient with operating the system in the Cloud.
  • You are a team player and give your best to win as a team.
  • Your communication skills are as fluent in English as they are in code (there are many German-speaking colleagues so German is a definite plus).
  • You, with an Agile mindset, view complex projects as opportunities for growth and learning. Your proactive approach to challenges demonstrates your independent work style.
  • You earn bonus points if you possess experience in React or Angular Front-Ends to further enhance your team's capabilities.

What we offer

  • Steep learning curve and the opportunity to contribute directly to the development of a successfully growing FinTech start-up - Take on responsibility right from the start
  • Flexible working hours
  • Individual benefits, such as company bike, urban sports club, Germany ticket and personal training budget
  • An attractive remuneration package
  • And look forward to our regular team events - in large and small groups

data.description:

    developer or a proven track record of developing successful software products
  • English communication is no obstacle for you

Benefits

  • Exciting and varied projects

  • Flexible working hours and variable work location
  • Family friendliness and healthy work-life balance
  • The opportunity to participate in the company‚Äôs development

  • 30 days of vacation and an attractive retirement package
  • Modern offices in a central city location with excellent accessibility
  • Extensive work equipment (also in the home office)
  • Job ticket
  • Attractive company health management: fitness program, job bike and much more
  • 100% remote work possible
  • A good conscience due to our open-source approach

Join us now and be part of our innovative team as a Backend Developer (m/f/d). Take the chance to shape the future of IT security with us!
